title: Lost Family: FOUND!
description: As adult children investigate their parents’ lives trying to understand their own existence, they discover a love story with heartache, mystery and intrigue, elements of human interest, times of war and peace, and travel--involving many states and two countries.The incredible discovery 68 years after the end of WWII, of an American family found by an unknown brother who was left behind in England, who led us to find other family secrets too impossible to imagine.The shock, the joy, and the surprises uncovered are shared as the separate lives begin to connect.Now the story of this family—and their lives, is rewritten. We hope this book will encourage others who are searching for their own lost families.
author: Heather L. Nelson
